summary: Realism based ENB that offers you only parallax effect, nothing else.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#6fa8dc][size=5]What is This?[/size][/color][/font][/center][center][color=#d8d8d8][size=3][font=Lucida Sans Unicode]This is a realism based ENB that gives you only parallax effect. Main purpose of this is that I believe there are many people out there who can't use an ENB without FPS drops. This ENB is probably the most performance friendly ENB ever.

Also, not everyone wants an ENB. Some people just want the awesome parallax effect.[/font][/size][/color][/center]
[center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#6fa8dc][size=5]How to Install?[/size][/color][/font][/center][color=#6fa8dc][size=4]1) [/size][/color][color=#d8d8d8][size=2]Download the ENB and drag it to your main Skyrim folder.[/size][/color]

[color=#6fa8dc][size=4]2) [/size][/color][size=2][color=#d8d8d8]Download v0265 from[/color][color=#6fa8dc] [/color][url=http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0265.htm]here[/url] [color=#d8d8d8]and open wrapper version. Then drag d3d9.dll and enbhost.exe to your main Skyrim folder.[/color][/size]
[size=4]
[color=#6fa8dc]3)[/color][/size][color=#d8d8d8][size=2]Open your skyrimprefs.ini and add these lines.

[Display]
bFloatPointRenderTarget=1
bTreesReceiveShadows=1
bDrawLandShadows=1
bShadowsOnGrass=1
fGamma=1.0000

[/size][/color][color=#6fa8dc][size=4]4) [/size][/color][color=#d8d8d8][size=2]Set your enblocal settings.

[/size][/color][color=#6fa8dc][size=4]5) [/size][/color][size=2]Turn off your AA and AF via Skyrim Launcher and you're ready to enjoy the parallax effect![/size]

[font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#6fa8dc][size=5][center]Suggestion[/center][/size][/color][/font][center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#d8d8d8][size=3]Since this ENB literally has nothing, you can drag any effect(bloom, dof and such) from other presets.

[/size][/color][/font][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#6fa8dc][size=5]Commenting Disabled[/size][/color][/font][/center][center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#d8d8d8][size=3]Commenting is disabled duo to 500 IQ people talking like they know everything.[/size][/color][/font][/center]

[center][img]https://farm9.staticflickr.com/8647/16270515436_1231e2ed16_o.jpg[/img][img]https://farm8.staticflickr.com/7514/16108913688_d53ef1dfec_o.jpg[/img][img]https://farm8.staticflickr.com/7581/15674036514_7808af4b02_o.jpg[/img][img]https://farm8.staticflickr.com/7536/16108913298_a6994d7431_o.jpg[/img][/center]
author: ProtologolusX
